attributes.action: consider changes in the laws covering vehicle excise duties to include a requirement for foreign cars to be registered so that checks on road worthiness and possession of insurance can be checked.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many foreigners coming into the country for work have brought their overseas registered vehicles with them with foreign plates and no indication of whether the cars are roadworthy or covered by insurance.  British people are being put at risk with the existing sloppy procedures in this regard.
